page.title: 06RECREATION
page.content: The Holton-le-Moor W.I.was formed in 1918.At the moment it has 21 members and meets once a month at the Moot Hall.It tries to cater for the very diverse interests of its members.Itis run by a committee and is affiliated to the national Federation of Womens Institute which is a countrywide organisation catering for the interests of women.Holton W.I.has come through the doldrums after a boom during the second World War.Recently we have been able to welcome some of the newcomersa to the village into the group aaand they have proved valuable assets.As the role of women in the community changes so does the W.I.and hopefully it will continue for thew next 67 years.
